001001 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
001001 00000 00010 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r2 3
001001 00000 00011 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r3 1
011111 00011 00001 00010 00000000000    # swo $r3 $r1 $r2 # memory[1] = $r3

001001 00000 00001 0000000000001010     # addi $r0 $r1 10
001001 00000 00010 1111111111111110     # addi $r0 $r2 -2
001001 00000 00011 0000000000000010     # addi $r0 $r3 2
011111 00011 00001 00010 00000000000    # swo $r3 $r1 $r2 # memory[2] = $r3

001001 00000 00001 1111111111111100     # addi $r0 $r1 -4
001001 00000 00010 0000000000010000     # addi $r0 $r2 16
001001 00000 00011 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r3 3
011111 00011 00001 00010 00000 000000   # swo $r3 $r1 $r2 # memory[3] = $r3

001001 00000 00001 0000000000000011     # addi $r0 $r1 3
001001 00000 00010 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r2 1
011101 00001 00010 00100 00000000000    # lwo $r1 $r2 $r4  # $r4 = memory[1]
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $4
00000000000000000000000000000001

001001 00000 00001 1111111111111100     # addi $r0 $r1 -4
001001 00000 00010 0000000000001100     # addi $r0 $r2 12
011101 00001 00010 00100 00000000000    # lwo $r1 $r2 $r4  # $r4 = memory[2]
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $4
00000000000000000000000000000010

001001 00000 00001 0000000000001110     # addi $r0 $r1 14
001001 00000 00010 1111111111111110     # addi $r0 $r2 -2
011101 00001 00010 00100 00000000000    # lwo $r1 $r2 $r4  # $r4 = memory[3]
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $4
00000000000000000000000000000011

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
